pages.title: Kamen Rider Tyrant
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Gaim Gaiden: Kamen Rider Baron (2015, V-Cinema film)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:gaim/devices/genesis_driver_tyrant)Genesis Driver (Tyrant)$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by any Genesis Driver user$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Resistance III$(li)Haste II$(li)Saturation$(li)Strength IV
